Utangulizi.content:
**Lishe bora wakati wa ujauzito** ni dawa ya asili kwa mama na mtoto. Kila kitu unachokula kinaingia damuni na kwenda moja kwa moja kwa mtoto wako. Hii inaamua ukuaji wa ubongo, mifupa, kinga, na uzito wa kuzaliwa.

![Pregnant Woman Eating Healthy](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/pregnant-woman-eating-salad.jpg)

### Faida 10 Kuu
1. Mtoto mwenye akili – Omega-3 huunda 60% ya ubongo
2. Kinga kali – Vitamin C hupunguza maambukizi 40%
3. Mifupa imara – Calcium 1000mg/siku
4. Kujifungua kwa urahisi – Uzito +11–16 kg tu
5. Kupunguza anemia – Iron 30mg/siku
6. Kulala vizuri – Magnesium hupunguza mikazo
7. Ngozi nzuri – Vitamin E hupunguza michirizi
8. Kuzuia kisukari – Fiber hupunguza sukari damuni
9. Kupunguza kichefuchefu – Kula mara 6 kwa siku
10. Furaha ya mama – Serotonin kutoka matunda

### Malengo ya eBook Hii
- Virutubisho 7 muhimu kwa kina
- Ratiba halisi ya kila siku Tanzania
- Vidokezo vya WHO & UNICEF
- Suluhisho la matatizo ya kawaida

### Vidokezo 5 vya Usalama
1. Osha mikono kabla ya kula
2. Pika nyama hadi iive kabisa
3. Epuka mayai mabichi
4. Hifadhi chakula kwenye friji
5. Kunywa maji safi au yaliyochemshwa

**Kila mboga, kila glasi ya maziwa – ni zawadi kwa mtoto wako!**

Virutubisho 7 Muhimu.content:
![Pregnancy Nutrition Pyramid](https://www.mayoclinic.org/-/media/kcms/gbs/patient-consumer/images/2023/08/17/11/24/pregnancy-nutrition-pyramid-4x3.jpg)

### 1. Folic Acid (400–600 mcg/siku)
- Huzuia kasoro za ubongo na uti wa mgongo
- Vyakula: Mchicha, maharagwe, parachichi, karanga
- Dawa: 400 mcg tablet kila siku

### 2. Iron (30 mg/siku)
- Hubeba oksijeni, huzuia anemia
- Vyakula: Nyama nyekundu, dengu, mchicha
- Vidokezo: Kula na limau au chungwa

### 3. Calcium (1000 mg/siku)
- Mifupa ya mtoto, hupunguza shinikizo la damu
- Vyakula: Maziwa, yogurt, dagaa, mboga za majani

### 4. Protein (70–100 g/siku)
- Ukuaji wa tishu na placenta
- Vyakula: Mayai, kuku, maharagwe, karanga

### 5. Omega-3 (200–300 mg DHA/siku)
- Maendeleo ya ubongo na macho
- Vyakula: Samaki, mbegu za chia, karanga za walnut

### 6. Vitamin D (600 IU/siku)
- Kunyonya calcium, kinga
- Vyakula + Jua: Mayai, samaki, jua la asubuhi dakika 15

### 7. Fiber (28 g/siku)
- Kuzuia kuvimbiwa, kudhibiti sukari
- Vyakula: Matunda, nafaka nzima, mboga

![Nutrient Sources Chart](https://www.nhs.uk/pregnancy/keeping-well/images/nutrient-sources-infographic.jpg)

**Kila virutubisho ni hatua kuelekea mtoto mwenye afya!**

Ratiba ya Kila Siku.content:
![Daily Meal Plan](https://www.babycenter.com/ims/2023/05/pregnancy-daily-meal-plan-4x3.jpg)

### Asubuhi (7:00 AM)
- Mayai 2 + mkate wa nafaka + parachichi ½ + juisi ya chungwa

### Vitafunwa (10:00 AM)
- Yogurt + ndizi + karanga 10

### Mchana (1:00 PM)
- Wali wa kahawia + samaki + mchicha + maharagwe

### Vitafunwa (4:00 PM)
- Embe + mbegu za chia

### Jioni (7:00 PM)
- Ugali + kuku + saladi ya nyanya na karoti

### Kabla ya Kulala (9:00 PM)
- Maziwa ya joto + asali kidogo

### Vidokezo
- Kula mara 6 (hakuna njaa)
- Kunywa maji lita 3+
- Chumvi chini ya 5g/siku
- Epuka sukari ya ziada

![Water Intake](https://www.healthline.com/health/pregnancy/images/water-intake-infographic.jpg)

**Ratiba hii inafaa Tanzania – badilisha mboga tu!**

Vidokezo vya Wataalamu.content:
![WHO Nutrition Advice](https://www.who.int/images/default-source/health-topics/pregnancy/nutrition-infographic.jpg)

### Vidokezo 10 vya WHO
1. Kula vyakula 5 vya rangi tofauti
2. Tumia nafaka nzima
3. Ongeza mbegu kila chakula
4. Samaki mara 2 kwa wiki
5. Maziwa ya chini ya mafuta
6. Pika kwa mafuta ya alizeti
7. Epuka vyakula vya mifuko
8. Tumia viungo vya asili
9. Pima uzito kila wiki
10. Lala saa 8

### Vyakula 10 vya Kuepuka
1. Pombe
2. Sigara
3. Samaki mkubwa (zebakii)
4. Jibini laini
5. Mayai mabichi
6. Kafeini >200mg
7. Nyama isiyopikwa
8. Juisi zisizochemshwa
9. Chakula cha barabarani
10. Dawa bila daktari

### Dawa za Ziada
- Folic acid 400 mcg
- Iron 30 mg
- Calcium 500 mg (ikiwa maziwa ni kidogo)

### Mazoezi
- Kutembea dakika 30
- Yoga ya ujauzito

**Afya ya mama ni afya ya taifa!**

Matatizo na Suluhisho.content:
![Pregnancy Complications](https://www.webmd.com/baby/ss/slideshow-pregnancy-complications-4x3.jpg)

### Kichefuchefu
- Kula biscuits kabla ya kuamka
- Chai ya tangawizi

### Kuvimbiwa
- Maji lita 3
- Matunda 3 (papai, ndizi)

### Anemia
- Nyama nyekundu mara 3 kwa wiki
- Mchicha + limau

### Shinikizo la Damu
- Punguza chumvi
- Ndizi na parachichi (potasiamu)

### Jinsi ya Kujua Mtoto Anapata Virutubisho
- Teke 10+ kwa siku (wiki 28+)
- Uzito +0.5 kg/wiki
- Hemoglobin 11g/dL+

**Matatizo yanapungua kwa lishe bora!**

### Muhtasari
Lishe bora ni uwekezaji wa maisha. Mtoto atakuwa na akili, kinga, na afya – mama atakuwa na nguvu na furaha.

### Hatua 3 za Leo
1. Andika ratiba ya wiki hii
2. Nunua mboga za majani na matunda
3. Tembea kliniki kwa vipimo

**Kila mama mjamzito ni shujaa – lishe bora ni silaha yako!**
